title: SPACED LETTER NECKLACE
content: Undoubtedly our best selling style. Nothing spells luxe like something made just for you. This piece will grow with you, is always in style, on-trend, and age-appropriate. Customize your heart out and get it in the world's finest metals.

title: DIAMOND VIRGO EARRING
content: As the analytical side of Mercury, Virgo is known to think matters through carefully and then make up their minds. Always one to formulate a clear and concise opinion, their words are golden and powerful. If you ever need advice, ask your Virgo bestie. They will guide you in the right direction by offering you pearls of wisdom.

title: 3 DIAMOND BRACELET
content: They say great things come in threes, and this luxe bracelet is no exception to that rule. In your choice of 14K yellow, rose or white gold, this delicate accessory showcases three stunning diamonds on its 6‚Äù chain. Layer with other BYCHARI gems or wear alone, this bracelet is the epitome of subtle style and refined elegance.
